page.title: 04INDUSTRY in THUNDRIDGE
page.content: Davies Magnet have been established here since the 1960's manufacturing fifth wheel couplings,trailer landing gear and other items for articulated truck haulage. The company was making magnetic mining equipment in the back garden of the family home in north London. They began to make fifth wheel couplings after Mr. Davies' brother returned with the idea from Canada after 1945. The market has expanded dramatically and there are only five firms making the same piece of equipment in the UK. Although they are the smallest of these firms, they regard themselves as making the'Rolls-Royce'version of their product They are facing severe competition from the USA, Germany and other European countries. So despite a growing market, they are half the size they were in 1980.
